message.content:
Read /Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/harmony-scoring.ts and extract all type definitions to a new file.

Create /Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/scoring/types.ts with:
1. All type definitions from lines 20-165 (Point, QualityTier, SeverityLevel, MeasurementUnit, MetricPolarity, MetricConfig, BezierCurveConfig, CurvePoint, MetricScoreResult, HarmonyAnalysis, FlawAssessment, StrengthAssessment, Ethnicity, Gender, DemographicKey, DemographicOverride)
2. Additional types: FlawMapping (lines 1952-1957), PSLRating, DemographicOptions, FrontProfileResults, SideProfileResults
3. Re-export LandmarkPoint from '@/lib/landmarks'

Make sure all types are exported. Write the complete file.

// ============================================
// MediaPipe Face Mesh Index Mapping
// ============================================
// NOTE: MEDIAPIPE_FRONT_MAPPING is defined in mediapipeDetection.ts (single source of truth)
// Import from there if needed: import { MEDIAPIPE_FRONT_MAPPING } from './mediapipeDetection';

// Helper to get category color for a landmark
export function getLandmarkColor(
  landmarkId: string,
  categories: LandmarkCategory[]
): string {
  for (const category of categories) {
    if (category.landmarks.includes(landmarkId)) {
      return category.color;
    }
  }
  return '#00f3ff'; // Default cyan
}
